display.title: It is goonna be goo!
display.description: Sure, that may speed up my demise, but what else am I gonna do? Just wait for the goo to take over while being a sadist towards those monsters? Look what happend last time by being careful! THEY ARE ALL DEAD AND THE GOO IS STILL HERE, EVERYWHERE! But now, I can't even die! Ever since the moment I opened my eyes again, it's only a question of time before it's only me, the goo, and the  monsters... WHY? No wonder Joe nuked everything.
